title: Is Romeo Wrong For How He Handled This Situation?
description:
Our producer Romeo was asked to do a favor by his mom. He helped her out but not in the timeframe that she wanted. Because of this, she was upset with him.
Now Romeo has beef with his mom because he believes the timeframe in which he completed the favor shouldn't matter. So who's right, who's wrong?
